subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|車|t1=wagon|徹|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} (彳 removed from phonetic) – wagon tracks.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: ''{{w|Xiandai Hanyu Guifan Cidian}}'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|现代汉语规范词典|suf=》}}) proscribes the use of the pronunciation [[chè]].
